alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 7:24PM EST until February 28 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Flooding threatens low lying roads and structures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EST Sunday the stage was 21.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 1 AM Monday.
